Functions
LR_fnc_InitCreatorActions
Description

This functions initializes the creator action system which allows mission creators to execute predefined functions/commands in (or, in general, interact with) the live mission.

Actions added using the function LR_fnc_AddCreatorAction can be executed at any point in time after it was added. If ACE is in use the actions are added directly to the self-actions, otherwise the mouse-wheel interaction menu is used.

Executed during postInit, don't call directly!

Parameters

None

Return Values

None

Examples

Nothing to see here

Author

Mokka
